description:
net: remove another unguarded sysfile == nil check

Putting aside the unguarded access to fd.sysfile, the condition will never be true as fd.incref above handles the closed condition.

messages.text:
Hello mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com, dvyukov@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2a55e349097f ***

net: remove another unguarded sysfile == nil check

Putting aside the unguarded access to fd.sysfile, the condition will never be true as fd.incref above handles the closed condition.

R=mikioh.mikioh, dvyukov
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6845062

subject: code review 6845062: net: remove another unguarded sysfile == nil check
